snippet: Mr. King, who led the British grocer from 2004 until last year, will serve as vice chairman and head of portfolio businesses at Guy Hands’ private equity firm.
abstract: Justin King will become vice chairman and head of portfolio businesses at private equity fund Terra Firma and take ownership stake in company.
lead_paragraph: Mr. King, who led the British grocer from 2004 until last year, will serve as vice chairman and head of portfolio businesses at Guy Hands’ private equity firm.

headline.main: Terra Firma Hires Justin King, Former J. Sainsbury C.E.O.
